description: This delicious spicy slow cooker curry takes a little bit longer than a takeaway but is worth the wait.
keywords: Sweet Potato & Cashew Slow Cooker Curry
name: Sweet Potato & Cashew Slow Cooker Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the stock cube and half the lime juice and cook on low for 6 hours until the sweet potatoes and cashews are tender and the sauce is thick. Add extra lime juice to taste.
Add the stock cube and half the lime juice and cook on low for 6 hours until the sweet potatoes and cashews are tender and the sauce is thick. Add extra lime juice to taste.
